TextView.android:text: I'm deeply sorry for your loss.Losing someone dear to us is never easy, and during this difficult time, my thoughts and prayers are with you and your family.May you find strength in the love and support of those around you, and may the memories you shared bring you comfort and peace in the days ahead.Please know that I am here for you if you need someone to talk to or if there's anything I can do to support you during this time of grief. Sending you my heartfelt condolences and wishin g you strength and healing in the days to come.
